Articles.Content:
Im sure you have heard of ORDA:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20604-Plugin-Parts-0-16-Orbital-Rendezvous-and-Docking-Assistant

Your challenge: make a space bus! overalll, it has to be a big ship, that is currently parked in kerbin orbit. then, you send up 1 or more (the one with the most wins) spacecraft and dock to it. the big ship then goes into sun orbit (like interplanetary mission) and then remans there, but a spacecraft (AKA bus) undocks and takes it back to kerbin (or jool when 0.17 is out )

Post pics or vids!

Rules:

1:No instant orbit generators

2: No using the teleport to target feature

3: have fun!

NEW RULES:

4:No tardis, magic bus, or any other cheaty stuff

5: Read post #8 for better explination.

GOOD LUCK

LEADERBOARD:

Then, use the small craft that docked to get back to kerbin. and uh, FACEPALM yes you are using mods! Here i quote myself: "Im sure you have heard of ORDA:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/...king-Assistant "

That is a docking mod, witch we will use for this.

Um, What i meant by a bus, is the mothership (the bus) carries passengers (the docked spacecraft) to other planets for 0.17 (but for this challenge just go back to kerbin) So, that isnt a bus, its just called that.

@Lucid lemon just like i said, not an ACTUAL bus, symply a spacecraft that carries spacecraft to other planets.
